https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xfirknzm8qr0L54jlxnBhROVWzL.jpg A gangster’s quest for revenge is sidetracked by an encounter with his target’s mother in this deeply-felt hybrid of a crime thriller and a family drama. Cruel Winter Blues
